code: import React from'react';import{Handle,Position}from'reactflow';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const MultiPurposeNode=_ref=>{let{data}=_ref;const inlineStyle={display:'inline-block',padding:'10px',border:'1px solid #ddd',borderRadius:'4px',backgroundColor:'#fff',maxWidth:'200px',height:'auto',overflow:'hidden'};const labelStyle={fontSize:'12px',whiteSpace:'normal',textOverflow:'pre-wrap',overflowY:'auto',maxHeight:'80px'};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"custom-node",style:inlineStyle,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{style:labelStyle,children:data.label}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Handle,{type:"source",position:Position.Top,id:"top",isConnectable:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Handle,{type:"source",position:Position.Right,id:"right-",isConnectable:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Handle,{type:"source",position:Position.Bottom,id:"bottom",isConnectable:true}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Handle,{type:"source",position:Position.Left,id:"left",isConnectable:true})]});};export default MultiPurposeNode;
